name: photojournalist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a photographer who creates news articles using mainly photographs: Once an award-winning photojournalist, she now takes pictures of food for glossy magazines. His mother is a freelance photojournalist. See
photojournalism
More examplesFewer examplesVeteran photojournalist PF Bentley has covered every presidential campaign since 1980.The Pulitzer prize-winning photojournalist records his family's adventures in their spooky new house.more than 150 photographs by some of the world's top photojournalists
